üíªüõ°How to Set Up Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for Mahidol University‚Äôs Google Workspace.
‚Ä¢ Let‚Äôs start by going to https://mail.mahidol.ac.th/.
‚Ä¢ Next, log in with your Mahidol University email account.
‚Ä¢ Click on your profile picture.   
‚Ä¢ Then select ‚ÄúManage your Google Account.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ From the menu on the left, select ‚ÄúSecurity.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Under ‚ÄúSigning in to Google,‚Äù click ‚Äú2-Step Verification.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Then click ‚ÄúTurn on 2-Step Verification.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Once it‚Äôs enabled, the 2-Step Verification tab will show the status as ‚ÄúOn.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Next, choose your preferred verification method. In this demonstration, we‚Äôll use Google Authenticator. Click ‚ÄúAuthenticator.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Then click ‚ÄúSet up Authenticator.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ A QR Code will appear on your screen.
‚Ä¢ Now, open the Google Authenticator app on your smartphone.
‚Ä¢ Tap the plus icon.
‚Ä¢ And scan the QR code displayed on your computer screen.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll then receive a 6-digit verification code on your smartphone.
‚Ä¢ Back on the website, click ‚ÄúNext.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Enter the code in the ‚ÄúEnter Code‚Äù field.
‚Ä¢ And click ‚ÄúVerify.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Once setup is complete, you‚Äôll see the message ‚ÄúAuthenticator app has been set up.‚Äù
üë®‚Äçüíªüì±Setting up 2FA only takes a few minutes, but it provides powerful protection against unauthorized access. We encourage everyone to enable 2FA to keep your data and our university systems safe.

2FA ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏£?

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
What Is 2FA?
üí° 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) adds an extra layer of protection to your online accounts. It requires two different factors to verify that it‚Äôs really you logging in.

Enable 2FA Today! Take just 5 minutes to activate 2FA on your most important accounts ‚Äî email, banking, and social media. It‚Äôs one of the simplest and most effective ways to protect your digital life.

üì£Exclusive for Mahidol University Students!
Get 1 Year of Free Access to Google AI Pro with Gemini.
Confirm your eligibility now ‚Äî available until December 9, 2025.
üî•üî•üî•
Recommended Benefits of Gemini
‚Ä¢ Homework and Exam Assistance
   Analyze entire textbooks ‚Äî up to 1,500 pages ‚Äî and get help preparing for exams.
‚Ä¢ Writing Support
   Generate first drafts, review feedback, and refine your ideas effortlessly.
‚Ä¢ Video Creation
   Turn plain text into dynamic videos powered by Veo 3.
‚Ä¢ NotebookLM
   Access audio summaries and up to 5√ó more reference materials.
‚Ä¢ Cloud Storage
   Get 2 TB of storage across Google Photos, Drive, and Gmail.
üëáüëáüëá
How to Confirm Your Eligibility
1. Scan the QR code to confirm your eligibility.
2. Log in and fill out the required details.
(Use your Mahidol University email address: firstname.lastname3letters@student.mahidol.ac.th)
üö®üö®üö®
Note: The free access period lasts for 1 year from your registration date.

Mahidol University, in collaboration with The S Curve Company Ltd. (a Google Cloud Certified Education Partner), is pleased to invite all students, faculty, and staff to participate in Phase 3 of the Samart Skills (Google Career Certificate) Program.
‚ÄºÔ∏èFree of Charge‚ÄºÔ∏è
.
üóìÔ∏è Important Dates
‚Ä¢  Application Period: Now ‚Äì August 31, 2025
‚Ä¢ Program Duration: Through December 2025
.
üéÅ Benefits for Students üéÅ
‚Ä¢ Activity Transcript Credits (for undergraduate students): Earn 30 hours of extracurricular activity credits for each main certificate completed, and 5 hours for each additional course.
‚Ä¢ Career Opportunities: Access exclusive job openings through the Samart Skills partner employer network.
.

In the meantime, to minimize disruption, we have compiled a list of alternative software tools with comparable functionalities to those offered by Adobe Creative Cloud. We recommend using these temporarily during the service interruption.

üì£ Temporary Unavailability of Adobe Creative Cloud Services 
Dear Adobe Creative Cloud Users,
Due to changes in the distribution policy of Adobe Creative Cloud by Adobe Systems Inc., the Division of Information Technology has proceeded with the procurement of a new software license package in accordance with the updated policy. The procurement has been completed, and the activation of the new license is currently being processed by Adobe. 

üö® As a result, users may experience a temporary unavailability of the Adobe Creative Cloud services provided by the university, starting from May 12, 2025, at 2:00 PM onward. 

üöß We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may cause and assure you that the Division of Information Technology will promptly notify all users as soon as the activation process is completed and the services are fully restored. 
............................................
üìå If you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at: 
üìû phone number +66 (0) 2849 6022  
‚úâÔ∏è email consult@mahidol.ac.th 
 
Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
Division of Information Technology, Mahidol University.

üì£Set @mahidol.edu as the sender.
If you would like to send an email using @mahidol.edu or choose one of your email addresses as the sender, please follow these steps.

1. Go to https://mail.mahidol.ac.th.
2. Click on the gear icon or the setting icon in the upper right corner. Then select ‚ÄúSee all settings‚Äù.
3. Go to the "Accounts" tab.
4. Under ‚ÄúSend mail as‚Äù click ‚ÄúAdd another email address‚Äù.
5. Enter the email address @mahidol.edu and then click ‚ÄúNext Step‚Äù.

üìß When the setting is complete, you can choose one of your email addresses as the sender.

.................................
üìû 0-2849-6022
üìß consult@mahidol.ac.th

üì£Notification of the change to Mahidol University email system.

üìß Before March 1, 2025
1 person has 2 emails, 2 inboxes and 2 login systems.
- name.sur@mahidol.ac.th  - name.sur@mahidol.edu

name.sur@mahidol.ac.th sends email as @mahidol.ac.th

name.sur@mahidol.edu sends email as @mahidol.edu

üìß From March 1, 2025
1 person will have 2 emails and 1 login system.
2 mailboxes will be merged into one. You can choose one of your email addresses as the sender.

You can log in to the Mahidol University email system at https://mail.mahidol.ac.th

Log in with name.sur@mahidol.ac.th.

You can choose the sender name either @mahidol.ac.th or @mahidol.edu by clicking on the setting ‚ÄúSetting > Accounts > Add another email address‚Äù.

.................................
üìû 0-2849-6022
üìß consult@mahidol.ac.th

üì¢ Notification üì¢ 
The email system for Mahidol University staff has been changed.
.
Division of Information Technology, Mahidol University will be transitioning the Mahidol University staff email system from the current system, https://webmail.mahidol.ac.th, to Mahidol University Google Workspace.
.
‚úÖ Beginning March 1, 2025, log into the new email system at https://mail.mahidol.ac.th.
‚úÖ Use the username firstname.sur@mahidol.ac.th.
‚úÖ All emails received prior to March 1, 2025 can still be read at https://webmail.mahidol.ac.th. It will not be possible to send emails via this portal. Https://webmail.mahidol.ac.th will be switched off from October 1, 2025.
‚úÖ After the migration to Mahidol University Google Workspace, you will still be able to receive incoming emails sent to email: @mahidol.edu on a regular basis.
‚úÖ Division of Information Technology will begin migrating systems on March 1, 2025 until the migration is successfully completed.
